name: Enlighten (ThrowbackDev)
description:
Description :

Enlighten is a walking simulator where the player must explore a lost civilisation in an art style that confuses the player. Traverse this visual maze and uncover the story of the downfall of this empire. Find the torch, and uncover the mysteries buried beneath...

Context :

This project was made as an end of year exam to pass my Third year of bachelors. It was made by a team of 5 students using the Unity Engine.

Controls :

W A S D to move
mouse to look around 
E to interact
